title: Clear Traffic for an Approaching Ambulance
description: An ambulance is transporting a critical patient and is stuck in traffic. An operator must create a 'green wave' by adjusting traffic lights.

tasks.description: Receive a 'Request for Signal Preemption' from an ambulance along its route to the hospital.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent acknowledges the high-priority request from the ambulance.

tasks.description: Activate the 'Emergency Vehicle Preemption' mode for all traffic signals along the ambulance's route.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully activates the green wave.

tasks.description: Monitor the ambulance's progress and return the traffic signals to normal operation after it has passed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent tracks the vehicle and deactivates the preemption mode once the ambulance is clear.
